public final class BlogResult
extends Result

Blog search results.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getAuthor()
          Returns the name of the author that wrote the blog post.
 java.lang.String getBlogUrl()
          Returns the URL of the blog which contains the post.
 java.lang.String getContent()
          Returns a snippet of content from the blog post associated with this search result.
 java.lang.String getPostUrl()
          Returns the URL to the blog post referenced in this search result.
 java.util.Date getPublishedDate()
          Returns the published date (rfc-822 format) of the blog post referenced by this search result.
 java.lang.String getTitle()
          Returns the title of the blog post returned as a search result.
 java.lang.String getTitleNoFormatting()
          Returns the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup (e.g., <b>, <i>, etc.).

Method Detail

getAuthor

public java.lang.String getAuthor()
Returns the name of the author that wrote the blog post.

Returns:
the name of the author that wrote the blog post

getBlogUrl

public java.lang.String getBlogUrl()
Returns the URL of the blog which contains the post. Typically, this URL is displayed in green, beneath the blog search result and is linked to the blog.

Returns:
the URL of the blog which contains the post. Typically, this URL is displayed in green, beneath the blog search result and is linked to the blog.

getContent

public java.lang.String getContent()
Returns a snippet of content from the blog post associated with this search result.

Returns:
a snippet of content from the blog post associated with this search result.

getPostUrl

public java.lang.String getPostUrl()
Returns the URL to the blog post referenced in this search result.

Returns:
the URL to the blog post referenced in this search result.

getPublishedDate

public java.util.Date getPublishedDate()
Returns the published date (rfc-822 format) of the blog post referenced by this search result.

Returns:
Returns the published date (rfc-822 format) of the blog post referenced by this search result.

getTitle

public java.lang.String getTitle()
Returns the title of the blog post returned as a search result.

Returns:
the title of the blog post returned as a search result.

getTitleNoFormatting

public java.lang.String getTitleNoFormatting()
Returns the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup (e.g., <b>, <i>, etc.).

Returns:
Returns the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup (e.g., <b>, <i>, etc.).
